shortDescription: A command injection vulnerability exists in /goform/exeCommand in Tenda W6 V1.0.0.9(4122), which allows attackers to construct cmdinput parameters for arbitrary command execution.
vulnerabilityName: Tenda w6_firmware Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
